name: We Don't Work Here That Way
name_original: We Don't Work Here That Way
description:
"We don't work here that way" is an episodic platformer game with quite an unusual theme (at least for a platformer). It was made with a wish to simply produce a neat-looking retro-styled game, but also to create something that bears a certain message: that of the dangers of workplace toxicity and office bullying.

All episodes are playable free of charge on the game's main site (you can play them in your browser with no download required):

https://work-game.alvrineom.com/

Currently published episodes:

  • Episode 1
  • Episode 2
  • Episode 3

You can view the list on episodes page which includes the progression stats for each episode.

If you want to contribute to the cause, you can do so via LINK. The game, as well as the game site, is run by a single person and it would help their further development.
